DOC.brief_summary: This study assess bioequivalence Merck clinical trial formulation ondansetron compare U.S. non-U.S. market formulation ondansetron .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study 3 Formulations Ondansetron Healthy Adults ( 0869-095 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: If female , subject pregnant breastfeeding Subject nonsmoker Subject good general health Subject history high blood pressure , asthma , cardiovascular , liver , neurologic , kidney disease Subject take prescription nonprescription drug discontinue study Subject habitual heavy consumer caffeine
